overview: Alex and Julien, in their sixties, living together for thirty years, have adopted Charlotte, who is now thirty. She gave them an adorable little girl, Clara, now five years old. This weekend, Charlotte calls them for help to keep Clara. For Alex and Julien, keeping their little girl busy for two days is a first! Quite a challenge for these “funny grandpas”.
title: Mes drôles de papys
